scripts.frontend:buildProd: npm run basic && npm run build --workspace=client
scripts.basic: npm run build --workspace=constants && npm run build --workspace=helpers
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=constants" "npm run dev --workspace=helpers" "npm run dev --workspace=client" "npm run dev --workspace=server"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=interfaces && npm run lint --workspace=constants && npm run lint --workspace=helpers && npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc --workspace=client && npm run tsc --workspace=server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=interfaces && npm run lint:fix --workspace=constants && npm run lint:fix --workspace=helpers && npm run lint:fix --workspace=client && npm run lint:fix --workspace=server
